title: [BUG] CVE-2023-6345 was reported to SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.2.88.7.nupkg
body:
### Description

Use the scan tool to check the vulnerabilities of the SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.2.88.7.nupkg, [CVE-2023-6345](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-6345) was reported. From the report, skia 88 is detected.

There are several articles about this vulnerability.
- https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2023/11/29/cve-2023-6345/
- https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/critical-zero-day-vulnerability-chrome-cve-2023-6345-ilangovan-xxgac

Please note, same vulnerability is reported to SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Win32.2.88.7.nupkg.

### Code

No code can be provided.

### Expected Behavior

Can someone please confirm whether skiasharp is vulnerable to the CVE-2023-6345?

### Actual Behavior

_No response_
